qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: WhatsApp, Snapchat, YouTube cricket, Google Classroom.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: No, keep phone private.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: Snapchat, WhatsApp, YouTube. Allow only needed permissions.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: Check if suspicious, skip if trusted app.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: Popular apps, friends use, check ratings.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Delete Snapchat messages and WhatsApp chats after private use.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Delete gallery, sign out, change lock before repair.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask elder cousin, uncomfortable if photos checked.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Only 2–3 close friends.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Yes, nicknames/emojis/initials.

qa.question: Helping Others
qa.answer: Helped neighbor set up Instagram, explained permissions briefly.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: Yes, disable mic/location in settings.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Google it or uninstall immediately.

qa.question: Contacts/Photos Access
qa.answer: Think used for suggestions, try to limit access.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, delete chats/photos, change password.

qa.question: Apps Opened by Repairer
qa.answer: Not happened, but friend’s gallery was opened.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: Pattern + fingerprint lock.

qa.question: App Origin Preference
qa.answer: Doesn’t matter, care about reviews/behavior.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: Cousin or YouTube tech channels.

qa.question: Influence from Others
qa.answer: Friends/Instagram reels warn about scams/privacy.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Delete chats/photos, remove Google account, log out apps before repair.
scenarios.Sharing Phone: Clear notifications, close apps, hand only briefly.
scenarios.Installing New App: Check ratings/reviews, cancel if permissions odd.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Install pension app, show basics, skip permissions explanation.
scenarios.Using Borrowed Phone: Lock screen if private content pops up.
scenarios.Giving Away Phone: Format twice, log out Gmail, clear downloads, remove SIM/SD.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Deleted photo stayed in Google Photos, now turned off auto-sync.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Use for YouTube, avoid banking/Gmail, use VPN if needed.
scenarios.Emergency Transfer: Confirm with call before UPI transfer.
